title: 17 cases registered against Shah Mehmood Qureshi in capital: IHC told
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 13 (APP):The Islamabad High Court (IHC) has been told on Monday that a total of 17 cases are registered against former foreign minister and PTI leader Shah Mehmood Qureshi in federal capital.
Justice Muhammad Azam Khan heard the case filed by Shah Mehmood Qureshi’s daughter Meharbanu Qureshi.
During hearing of the case, federal police’s DSP Legal Sajid Cheema submitted a report containing cases details against PTI leader.
The report said that a total of 17 cases are registered at various police stations of the capital against Shah Mehmood Qureshi. Different sections have been applied in these FIRs.
It also said that a case under sections of anti-terrorism clauses is also registered at Counter Terrorism Department (CTD).
The court, after the report was presented, adjourned hearing due to absence of petitioner’s representative.
